extendedInfo.description: Get the GAME OF THE YEAR award-winning puzzler!Help Swampy by guiding water to his broken shower. Each level is a challenging physics-based puzzle with amazing life-like mechanics. Cut through dirt to guide fresh water, dirty water, toxic water, steam, and ooze through increasingly challenging scenarios! Every drop counts!â¢ Original Stories & Characters â Play through 4 unique stories featuring Swampy, Allie, Cranky and Mystery Duck. Thatâs over 500 amazing puzzles!â¢ Innovative Mechanic â See water in various forms and use your creativity to solve the puzzles â totally stimulating! â¢ Collectibles, Challenges, and Bonus Levels â Collect special items uniquely designed for each character and complete cool challenges to unlock bonus levels! âTri-Duckâ each level for ultimate bragging rights!â¢ Brand New Levels Every Week â Hurry and play before they expire, and be sure to use âPhoto Finishâ to share how you beat the new levels!SWAMPYâS STORY Swampy the Alligator lives in the sewers under the city. Heâs a little different from the other alligators â heâs curious, friendly, and loves taking a nice long shower after a hard day at work. But thereâs trouble with the pipes and Swampy needs your help getting water to his shower! ALLIEâS STORYAllie is the sewer's most creative alligator. Her quirky spirit and artistic talents made her a star. Now, the gators have crafted a one-of-a-kind steam-powered musical instrument, and can't wait to hear her play it! Help Allie get the steam she needs and enjoy her take on classic Disney tunes.CRANKYâS STORY Cranky, a real gatorâs gator, has a big appetite and will eat anything, from tires to old fish bones. But he refuses to eat his greens! Use the dirty purple water to clear the algae on Crankyâs plate so he can gobble up his âfoodâ. MYSTERY DUCK Catch this fancy teleporting Mystery Duck in this special chapter and hint hint - timing is everything! Find all kinds of surprises including the biggest duck ever, MegaDuck and cute little Ducklings! Some stories may require a small additional price but try the FREE levels today!Visit www.facebook.com/WheresMyWater for more hints, tips and secrets. Follow Swampy @SwampyTheGator on Twitter.Terms of Use: http://disneytermsofuse.com/

reviews.title: Love this game...
reviews.comment: Great game.
reviews.author: Sakeenah Shakir

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good, good, and very COOL! It\'s best game ever and my little brother is playing this game too!!! Thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: Really a super cool game.. Worth the money.. Fun way to spend time.. And yes it\'s super addictive
reviews.author: Promit Bhattacherjee

reviews.title: Fun as everyone says!
reviews.comment: Imaginative and challenging, but not impossible. Fun, cute puzzles.
reviews.author: Kelli Watts

reviews.title: Good but pricey..
reviews.comment: Why not raise the initial app purchase to somewhat cover the in-app purchasing? It\'s ridiculous that there\'s now 3 other characters/stages you download but can\'t play unless you pay more.
reviews.author: Dean Shepherd

reviews.title: Very good game
reviews.comment: It\'s a wonderful passtime! Some of the levels are harder than others but over all, very good game, I love it!
reviews.author: yara abou zahr

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Great fun and good for your problem solving skills. Kept me entertained right to the end. Thanks
reviews.author: Sven Johansen

reviews.title: Awesome game!!!
reviews.comment: I bought every character and I have to say, this is where it\'s at if you\'re looking for a game that is both challenging and entertaining! Can\'t wait for those 2 new Allie episodes. Great work, Disney!  :)
reviews.author: jason norton

reviews.title: A+
reviews.comment: Entertaining, easy but still challenging, and good water physics :) Love it
reviews.author: Heber Ramirez

reviews.title: Bug
reviews.comment: When i restart the phone the game is deleted. I need to reinstall after each reboot. Pls fix. Running JB 4.1 on Galaxy S2 -  not rooted.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Addictive puzzle fun
reviews.comment: Great puzzles and very addictive to play. My 6 year old loves the game too. Worth every penny.
reviews.author: Asif Ahmed

reviews.title: I\'ve always loved this game!
reviews.comment: This game is so fun to play! I don\'t even have any children but me and my boyfriend (20 & 21 yeas old, mind you) LOVE this game! I was so happy that they finally came out with Allie, looking forward to hours of more fun! :)
reviews.author: Jessica Lynn

reviews.title: Great Game! :)
reviews.comment: Worth every penny and great help to pass time with! :) Good job guys/gals! :
reviews.author: Maria Lacson

reviews.title: Best New Game
reviews.comment: In between levels the curtain is distorted.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun addictive
reviews.comment: Worth the money great quirky brainteaser
reviews.author: WailOfDoom

reviews.title: Love this game
reviews.comment: Fun game, worth the money! But it is very addictive. Plus I love all the bonus levels
reviews.author: Cinndy French-Barnes

reviews.title: Cayla
reviews.comment: Won\'t update, says \'invalid download URL\' love this game so I\'m not happy, as I purchased the full version too! Please sort it out!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent fun
reviews.comment: Wheres is the best game series on any mobile platform. Better than Angry Birds
reviews.author: John Clavey

reviews.title: Challenging and fun
reviews.comment: My four year old and I enjoy this game and it builds up your problem solving skills.  If you have a kid they\'ll enjoy it.
reviews.author: Paul Peynado

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Cant get enough. Playin it again cos my phone got wiped. And played it on my tab 2 and now my new galaxy note 10.1......Love it love it love it
reviews.author: A Google User
